sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form class="add-main-task" @submit.prevent="$emit('add-task', newTaskText)">
    <input
        type="text"
        v-model="newTaskText"
        placeholder="Add a new task"
        @keyup.enter="$emit('add-task', newTaskText)"
    >
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      newTaskText: ''
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.add-main-task {
  width: 100%;
}
.add-main-task input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 11px 20px;
  background-color: #FFECD8;
  border: 1.5px dashed #FFCA93;
  border-radius: 10px;
}
</style>
